name: Quible Sphere
description: Roll through 40 different levels that increase in difficulty, avoiding several obstacles and using powerups in order to get to the end of each level!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Graphics: Any graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Graphics: Any graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space
